item.title: Idyllwilde add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Idyllwilde add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "Horse sense is the thing a horse has which keeps it from betting on people. " -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Idyllwilde add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "...I am writing these poems from inside a lion..." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Idyllwilde add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "If you are a dreamer come in If you are a dreamer a wisher a liar A hoper a pray-er a magic-bean-buyer If youre a pretender com sit by my fire For we have some flax golden tales to spin Come in! Come in!" -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Idyllwilde add a quote by Flannery O'Connor
item.description: "Everywhere I go I'm asked if I think the university stifles writers. My opinion is that they don't stifle enough of them. There's many a best-seller that could have been prevented by a good teacher." -- Flannery O'Connor
